title: Students Scoring Between 60 and 70 in English
description: The English department wants to know how many students scored between 60 and 70 in English to provide targeted support. Write a query to count the number of students who scored between 60 and 70 in English with the column name `english_range_count`.
hint:
To find scores within a range so neat,
Use `BETWEEN` in `WHERE`, it's a treat.
